about_the_game:
A free bonus pack for all of our wonderful supporters!

Curious to see how the game evolved over the course of it's development?
Check out a bunch of cool behind the scenes concept art pieces, as well as bonus lewd goodies!

Where to find the pack:
After you download it, the art pack will be accessible in the game's directory folder, accessible through right-clicking on Overgrown: Genesis in your Steam library, then selecting Properties > Browse Local Files

content_descriptors.notes: nude artwork of the various character in the game are included
